SEARCH
Package com.example.segfaultsquadapplication.impl.moodevent

Class MoodEventManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.segfaultsquadapplication.impl.moodevent.MoodEventManager
public class MoodEventManager extends Object
Encapsulates MoodEvent's related interactions with database.
The display section of code should be completely decoupled with document snapshots.
Only the logic to handle mood events and respond to exceptions are needed.

  • Method Details

    • createMoodEvent

      public static void createMoodEvent(android.content.Context ctx, MoodEvent.MoodType moodType, String reason, boolean isPublic, @Nullable MoodEvent.SocialSituation situation, @Nullable android.net.Uri imgUri, Consumer<Boolean> callback)
      Creates a mood event from the specified params
      Parameters:
      ctx - Android context
      moodType - Mood type
      reason - Text reason
      isPublic - Whether the event is public
      situation - Social situation; defaults to MoodEvent's default situation if is null
      imgUri - Image Uri (optional)
      callback - Callback on success/failure
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - Exception thrown when data is invalid / encounters IO exception reading image

    • addMoodEvent

      private static void addMoodEvent(MoodEvent.MoodType moodType, String reason, @Nullable List<Integer> imgBytes, @Nullable MoodEvent.SocialSituation situation, boolean isPublic, Consumer<Boolean> callback)
      Helper function for createMoodEvent.
      Parameters:
      moodType - Mood type
      reason - String reason
      imgBytes - Parsed image bytes
      situation - Social situation; defaults to MoodEvent's default situation if is null
      isPublic - Whether the event is publicly visible
      callback - Success/failure callback

    • updateMoodEvent

      public static void updateMoodEvent(android.content.Context ctx, MoodEvent moodEvent, MoodEvent.MoodType moodType, String reason, boolean isPublic, MoodEvent.SocialSituation situation, @Nullable android.net.Uri imgUri, Consumer<Boolean> callback) throws RuntimeException
      Updates the mood event and saves it to the database.
      Parameters:
      ctx - Android context
      moodEvent - Mood event
      moodType - New mood type
      reason - Reason text
      isPublic - Whether the mood event is publicly visible
      situation - Social situation
      imgUri - Optional - image Uri
      callback - Success/failure callback
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - Exception thrown on invalid data / IO exception

    • addComment

      public static void addComment(MoodEvent moodEvent, String comment, Consumer<Boolean> callback)
      Adds the comment to the mood event and save the result to database.
      Parameters:
      moodEvent - Mood event
      comment - The comment to add
      callback - Success/failure callback
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - Exception thrown on invalid data / IO exception

    • validateMoodEvent

      public static void validateMoodEvent(MoodEvent.MoodType moodType, String reason) throws RuntimeException
      Validates the mood type and reason length for a mood event.
      Parameters:
      moodType - Mood type; exception thrown if mood type is null
      reason - Reason text; exception thrown if too long.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - Throws exception when the data is invalid.

    • encodeImg

      private static List<Integer> encodeImg(android.content.Context ctx, @Nullable android.net.Uri imgUri) throws RuntimeException
      Encodes image from Uri to bit array.
      Parameters:
      ctx - Android context
      imgUri - Image uri
      Returns:
      The bit array ready to be saved
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - Exception thrown if IOException met; wrapped with RuntimeException to directly show error message to android UI

    • getAllMoodEvents

      public static void getAllMoodEvents(@Nullable String userId, Function<com.google.firebase.firestore.Query,com.google.firebase.firestore.Query> filter, Collection<MoodEvent> holder, Consumer<Boolean> onComplete)
      Gets all mood events satisfying the filter. If user id is provided, the records are restricted to the specified user.
      On success, all mood events will be saved in the holder; otherwise, holder will not be changed.
      Parameters:
      userId - User id, optional
      filter - Filter for the mood event
      holder - The holder for retrieved mood events
      onComplete - Callback when operation is completed

    • getMoodEventById

      public static void getMoodEventById(String moodId, AtomicReference<MoodEvent> holder, Consumer<Boolean> callback)
      Retrieves a mood event with its document ID in the database.
      Parameters:
      moodId - The document moodId.
      holder - This will contain the mood event
      callback - Called when finished, whether the retrieval is a success(true) or failure(false).

    • updateMoodEventById

      private static void updateMoodEventById(String fileId, Map<String,Object> updates, Consumer<Boolean> callback)
      Updates a mood event with its internal document ID in the database.
      Parameters:
      fileId - The id of the file to update.
      updates - The updates to handle.
      callback - The callback when the file is saved(true) or can not be saved(false).

    • deleteMoodEventById

      public static void deleteMoodEventById(String id, Consumer<Boolean> callback)
      Deletes a mood event with its document ID in the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The document id.
      callback - The callback when the file is deleted(true) or can not be deleted(false).
